sql-statements.sql: select a.ORG_NAME,a.TOTAL_COUNT,a.MORNING_COUNT,a.AFTERNOON_COUNT,a.ACTUAL_ACCOUNT, a.EXFACTORY_ACCOUNT,a.WAITING_ACCOUNT,a.SHORTAGE_ACCOUNT from mis_job_trucking_count_v a union all SELECT 'Total', sum(TOTAL_COUNT)total_count,sum(MORNING_COUNT)MORNING_COUNT, sum(AFTERNOON_COUNT)AFTERNOON_COUNT,sum(ACTUAL_ACCOUNT)ACTUAL_ACCOUNT,sum(EXFACTORY_ACCOUNT),sum(WAITING_ACCOUNT), sum(SHORTAGE_ACCOUNT) FROM mis_job_trucking_count_v
